website_summaries.verdict: This shampoo is made by a popular salon brand and contains ingredients that nourish hair and prevent fading. Earns praise for extending the time in between coloring.
pros: Formulated with UV protective ingredients that keeps the sun from fading color
Contains proteins that strengthen hair and make it more manageable
Has a creamy consistency that lathers well, so a few drops go a long way
cons: Reports of itchy scalp and breakouts after using it
Some customer gripe about receiving shampoo that seems old upon arrival, leading them to question the authenticity

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. I used to purchase it from a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I used to purchase it from a beauty salon but it was not always available. Very glad to find it on Amazon. I have waist length hair and this size keeps me in shampoo for close to half a year.
customer_reviews.author: Patience

customer_reviews.title: Awesome profuct
customer_reviews.text: You just use a little and it goes a long way. One bottle will last a year
customer_reviews.author: Pamela muench

customer_reviews.title: I have used other color treatment shampoos that have given better results.
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance doesn't last long and it was just okay. Not worth the extra cost. I have used other color treatment shampoos that have given better results.
customer_reviews.author: Harrelmt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how it smells and how shiny it leaves my hair! :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Casique

customer_reviews.title: When I received this product I realized immediately it was ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product I realized immediately it was not near the quality of Redken Color Extend Shampoo that I have been buying at my salon for the last several years. I'm assuming it is watered down but who knows. I will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. My husband and I both use it, haha. Love the smell and love how the hair feels after washing with this. I am using it the conditioner from this line as well, and oh, what a great fragrance and quality! The vendor that I purchased from here delivered the package without spillage or damage. The package arrived in time (a day earlier even) in one piece! Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LazyJo

customer_reviews.title: I think it works pretty well. I color my hair a shade of ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it works pretty well. I color my hair a shade of red and red always fades the quickest, so it definitely does a better job than anything else I've used. I will continue to use until they come up with something that does NO fading at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO glad I tried this, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Weakland

customer_reviews.title: I love it, makes my hair & scalp so healthy
customer_reviews.text: I began using this shampoo about 5 years or more. I love it, makes my hair & scalp so healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Randall H. Leuschke

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, only downside is the large bottle. Probably should have purchased the pump top
customer_reviews.author: fenian51

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient when used with a pump.
customer_reviews.text: I spend lots of money on my hair coloring and highlighting so I have used this product for year and always will. I buy it here so I can have the 32 oz and a pump for convenience in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: California Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Nice lather and leaves hair quite manageable. Have fine hair, but doesn't weigh it down. Decided to buy the pump that fits it and it's much easier to dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce K.

product_meta.title: REDKEN Color Extend Shampoo, 33.8 Fl Oz, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Redken Color Extend Shampoo gently cleanses and protects to leave hair manageable, refreshed and shiny. Advanced Color Extend offers even stronger protection to extend the life and vibrancy of hair color. Redken's exclusive Interbond Conditioning System and Fade Resist Complex with powerful micro-net technology and UV filters help lock in color and lock out aggressors. Hair color looks vibrant and radiant with mirror-like shine.
